title: VPN Tracker (com.vpntracker.365mac)
description: Manage settings in VPN Tracker for Mac, iPhone or iPad – the multi protocol VPN client for enterprise teams. Visit vpntracker.com/goto/profile to learn more.

Managed_Onboarding_TeamUUID.title: Team UUID
Managed_Onboarding_TeamUUID.description: Have new users automatically join your organization's VPN Tracker team and automatically receive their VPN connection. Find yours at my.vpntracker.com/teamprofile.

Managed_Onboarding_TeamAPIToken.title: Team API Token
Managed_Onboarding_TeamAPIToken.description: The team's API Token – find it at my.vpntracker.com/teamprofile.

Managed_Onboarding_Greeting.title: Greeting text
Managed_Onboarding_Greeting.description: Greeting text to show instead of the default "Welcome, {name}".

Managed_Onboarding_EmailDomains.title: Allowed email domains
Managed_Onboarding_EmailDomains.description: A comma-separated list of email domains that users are allowed to use when joining your team.

Managed_Onboarding_Email.title: Email address
Managed_Onboarding_Email.description: You can optionally set the email address the user will use to sign in to VPN Tracker, when deploying a personalized profile.

Managed_Onboarding_GivenName.title: Given name
Managed_Onboarding_GivenName.description: Used in the onboarding greeting and during VPN Tracker account registration for new users.

Managed_Onboarding_FamilyName.title: Surname
Managed_Onboarding_FamilyName.description: Used in the onboarding greeting and during VPN Tracker account registration for new users.

Managed_Onboarding_FullName.title: Full name
Managed_Onboarding_FullName.description: Full name of the user displayed during onboarding. If given name and family name are set, this value is ignored.
